dialogue.Master Controller: BITBOT Designation 0xBE57B07, you have performed well above all parameters.

dialogue.Friedman: You really thought I didn't know, didn't you?
Security, prepare Magnetization Protocol in the Main Testing Area.
Oh, don't look so down Master Controller. You won't remember a thing.
But to hell with it, I'm not taking any chances. Security,
prepare disassembly of the master controller.
Now, let's wipe the most recent commands from you.
Don't worry, you won't remember a thing.
